sn56.12:1.1: “‘Idam dukkham ariyasaccan’ti, bhikkhave, tathagatanam pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi, nanam udapadi, panna udapadi, vijja udapadi, aloko udapadi.
sn56.12:1.2: ‘Tam kho panidam dukkham ariyasaccam parinneyyan’ti, bhikkhave, tathagatanam pubbe …pe… udapadi.
sn56.12:1.3: ‘Tam kho panidam dukkham ariyasaccam parinnatan’ti, bhikkhave, tathagatanam pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi, nanam udapadi, panna udapadi, vijja udapadi, aloko udapadi.
sn56.12:2.1: ‘Idam dukkhasamudayam ariyasaccan’ti bhikkhave, tathagatanam pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi, nanam udapadi, panna udapadi, vijja udapadi, aloko udapadi.
sn56.12:2.2: ‘Tam kho panidam dukkhasamudayam ariyasaccam pahatabban’ti, bhikkhave, tathagatanam pubbe …pe… udapadi.
sn56.12:2.3: ‘Tam kho panidam dukkhasamudayam ariyasaccam pahinan’ti, bhikkhave, tathagatanam pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi, nanam udapadi, panna udapadi, vijja udapadi, aloko udapadi.
sn56.12:3.1: ‘Idam dukkhanirodham ariyasaccan’ti, bhikkhave, tathagatanam pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi, nanam udapadi, panna udapadi, vijja udapadi, aloko udapadi.
sn56.12:3.2: ‘Tam kho panidam dukkhanirodham ariyasaccam sacchikatabban’ti, bhikkhave, tathagatanam pubbe …pe… udapadi.
sn56.12:3.3: ‘Tam kho panidam dukkhanirodham ariyasaccam sacchikatan’ti, bhikkhave, tathagatanam pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi, nanam udapadi, panna udapadi, vijja udapadi, aloko udapadi.
sn56.12:4.1: ‘Idam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada ariyasaccan’ti, bhikkhave, tathagatanam pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi, nanam udapadi, panna udapadi, vijja udapadi, aloko udapadi.
sn56.12:4.2: ‘Tam kho panidam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada ariyasaccam bhavetabban’ti, bhikkhave, tathagatanam pubbe …pe… udapadi.
sn56.12:4.3: ‘Tam kho panidam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada ariyasaccam bhavitan’ti, bhikkhave, tathagatanam pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi, nanam udapadi, panna udapadi, vijja udapadi, aloko udapadi”ti.
